title: Never Ever After: Angel
description: The #1 series for Dysfunctional Relationships as shown on the Amazon top 100 (July 2013).Final part of Never Ever AfterSaskia has spent the past year with the man she loves, she had ups and downs but things finally look up for Saskia and William.Suddenly she loses everything that was important to her, she tries to move on but her heart belongs to William.Follow the story described as the modern day Romeo and Juliet and discover first loves and loses with the witt and flare of Saskia and Wills changing P.O.V.
author: Mercy Cortez
